price: El día que la tierra y las montañas convulsionen, y las montañas se conviertan en arena dispersa.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
